apps.title: kangxh.com
apps.description: The web itself is  hosted on AKS. Previously in App Service. Moved to Container to save cost and better portability

apps.title: Azure Vote
apps.description: Sample web application deployed on AKS. scalable front tier with Redis cache service. Expose with Ingress Controoler

apps.title: TaskAPI
apps.description: Sample API server without backed database tier. Explose with ingress controller and manamged by APIM with AAD protect

apps.title: OCR in Container
apps.description: OCR labeltool on AKS with API call to Azure SEA Cognative Service. OCR API server not in AKS due to limited resource

gitrepos.title: PoC with AKS + APIM
gitrepos.description: Using aks as backed server to handle API calles redirected by APIM. it is actually two seperated components, no much integration task between

gitrepos.title: Oracle ExaData Migration
gitrepos.description: Oracle RAC server onprem migration is conflex as oracle does not certify any RAC on cloud except OCI. It is more political than technical. Anyway, testing M series VM with FlashGrid

gitrepos.title: Python Flask in Container
gitrepos.description: Python Learning project. Practice to run Python Flask App in AKS with Azure Resources to keep state, Azure File, CosmosDB, EventHub, etc
